Legal Notice

  • Legal Notice

In accordance with the provisions of articles 6-III and 19 of law n°2004-575 of June 21st, 2004, for confidence in the digital economy, known as LCEN, we bring the following information to the attention of the users and visitors of the www.villathalassa-lavandou.fr website.

Proprietors

• Company's name : Villa Thalassa Art'B&B
• Name of the owner : Elisabeth Tholey-Frey
• Address : Chemin de la Fouasse, Villa Thalassa, 83980 Le Lavandou, France
• TVA Number : FR71820981959

Hosting of the villathalassa-lavandou.fr website

• Hosting company's Name: PlanetHoster
• Hosting company's Address : 4416 Louis B. Mayer, Laval (Québec) H7P 0G1, Canada
• Hosting company's Phone Number: 0 805 080 426

villathalassa-lavandou.fr website and hypertext links

Villa Thalassa Art'B&B declines all responsibility in case of late updates or interruption of service of the villathalassa-lavandou.fr website. Villa Thalassa Art'B&B has the right to correct, at any moment and without notice, the contents of the website. Hypertext links can link to other websites than the current website. Villa Thalassa Art'B&B has no control over the contents of said websites and declines any responsibility in case the contents of said sites are in violation of current laws and regulations.

Intellectual property

French and international legislation on copyright and intellectual property apply to the entire website. Photographs, texts, slogans, drawings, images, and animated sequences, auditory or not, as well as any works integrated into the website, are the property of Villa Thalassa Art'B&B and its to use. Logos, icons, and graphic chips represented on the website are protected under copyright and articles L.511.1 and according to the Intellectual Property Code concerning the protection of the registered designs. All rights to reproduction and reserved and strictly limited, including for downloadable documents and iconographic and photographic representations. The brands referenced on this website are submitted by the companies who own them. All non-authorized use of all or part of these rights by a third party is likely to lead to judicial pursuit except with written authorization from Villa Thalassa Art'B&B, given with prior consultation.

Protection of goods and people – personal data management:

In France, personal data are protected most notably by law n°78-87 of January 6th, 1978, law n°2004-801 of August 6th, 2004, article L. 226-13 of the Penal Code and the European Direction of October 24th, 1995.

The www.villathalassa-lavandou.fr website collects personal information related to the user only by the necessity for certain services provided by the website. The user provides this information in full knowledge of the cause, notably when they willingly provide such information. In this case, it is specified to the user of the website that they are not obligated to provide this information.

In accordance with the provisions of articles 38 and following lew 78-17 of January 6th, 1978, concerning information, files, and liberties, every user has the right to access, rectify, suppress, and oppose personal data that concerns them. To exercise this right, address your request by email at contact@villathalassa-lavandou.fr or in signed, written form, accompanied by a copy of signed proof of identity, specifying the address to which the response must be sent.

No personal information about the user of the www.villathalassa-lavandou.fr website is published without the user’s knowledge, exchanged, transferred, yielded, or sold to any third parties.
